typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'xml',
	fileSystem: 'formula1',
	folderPath: 'RAW',
	fileName: 'circuits.xml',
	validationMode: 'none',
	namespaces: true,
	namespacePrefixes: ['http://ergast.com/mrd/1.4'->'CR']) ~> XMLFromADLS2
XMLFromADLS2 foldDown(unroll(),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
